p: Thirty naïve Holando-Argentino breed male calves with an average age of 216 days (range 210–225) and an average weight of 205 kg, were used. The experimental protocol followed biosecurity and animal welfare internal and federal regulations and was approved by the Institutional Committee for the Use and Care of Experimental Animals (CICUAE, CICVyA-INTA). Sample size of experimental groups were estimated following a previous report [8].
